description: Want to congratulate Sumitra ji for having envisioned this programme & I congratulate all of you who joined the programme: PM @narendramodi — PMO India (@PMOIndia) March 6, 2016 In addition to structural component of programmes like this, experiences shared during personal meets, over tea, meals are…
caption: www.narendramodi.in
message:
Yesterday & today I joined the National Conference of Women Legislators. I congratulate Speaker Sumitra Mahajan ji for this great initiative. 

Today, I spoke about women-led development & why women lawmakers must use technology to connect with citizens. http://www.narendramodi.in/pm-modi-at-the-national-conference-of-women-legislators-in-new-delhi-427889
